# Phoenix Framework llms.txt Index
> Index of llms.txt files covering specific aspects of the Phoenix framework.

This index points to llms.txt files covering specific aspects of the Phoenix framework.

## Topics
* [LiveView](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix_live_view/llms.txt): Best practices for Phoenix LiveView.
* [Routing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix/routing/llms.txt): Guidelines for defining routes in Phoenix.
* [Controllers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix/controllers/llms.txt): Best practices for Phoenix controllers.
* [Contexts & Schemas](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix/contexts_schemas/llms.txt): Guidelines for designing contexts and Ecto schemas.
* [Channels](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix/channels/llms.txt): Best practices for using Phoenix Channels.
* [Views & Templates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bradleygolden/llmstxt-elixir/refs/heads/main/libs/phoenix/views_templates/llms.txt): Guidelines for Phoenix views and templates.
